name: handled-project-hub-agent
description: Dual-faced Project Hub Agent - mediates customer-tenant communication post-booking

scripts.deploy: npm run build && npx adk deploy cloud_run --project=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT:-handled-484216} --region=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION:-us-central1} --service_name=project-hub-agent
scripts.deploy:dry-run: npm run build && npx adk deploy cloud_run --project=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_PROJECT:-handled-484216} --region=${GOOGLE_CLOUD_LOCATION:-us-central1} --service_name=project-hub-agent --dry-run
